info.title: Open a modal dialog in reading mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToAddDeliveryAddressButton
setupScript.description: sets focus on the 'Add Delivery Address' button
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the 'Add Delivery Address' button
testPageDocument.querySelector('#ex1 > button').focus();

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Add Delivery Address' button, open the dialog.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Add Delivery Address' button, open the dialog.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn on the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Name of the focused input ('Street') is conveyed
The ability to enter text into the focused input is conveyed
